original_text: After a long time, the master came home. He asked the servants to come to him. He wanted to know how much money they had now.
korean_text: 오랜 후에 그 종들의 주인이 돌아와 그들과 결산할새

sentences.original_text: After a long time, the master came home.
sentences.korean_translation: 오랜 시간이 지난 후, 주인이 집으로 돌아왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He asked the servants to come to him.
He wanted to know how much money they had now.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 지금 얼마나 많은 돈을 가지고 있는지 알고 싶어했습니다.
